weekly_top_story.headline: CDC adopts ACIP vaccine recommendations amid ongoing shifts in COVID-19 vaccine guidance
weekly_top_story.summary: The CDC has updated its adult immunization schedule to include 'shared clinical decision-making' for COVID-19 vaccines in pregnant people while continuing to limit vaccine approval to high-risk groups, reflecting ongoing adjustments in vaccination policy that affect healthcare providers and patients.

stories.headline: AHIMA urges reinstatement of telehealth flexibilities for Medicare beneficiaries
stories.summary: AHIMA and 58 organizations called on Congress to retroactively reinstate telehealth benefits for Medicare patients, highlighting the negative impacts on access to care caused by recent policy lapses.

stories.headline: AHA highlights hospitals' use of AI to improve care delivery in Senate hearing
stories.summary: The American Hospital Association submitted a statement on how hospitals and health systems are integrating artificial intelligence to enhance patient care and workforce support amid rapid industry change.
